attributes.action: Recognition for the Late Paul McKeever
attributes.additional_details: On the 17th January 2013 Paul McKeever, Chairman of the Police Federation of England and Wales suddenly passed away from a suspected embolism. Paul had given 35yrs of his life to Policing and was passionate in defence of the Service and those who work in the Service. I now call upon the Government to recognise the service that Paul McKeever had given over 35yrs in the Police service and in the wider criminal justice arena
